game.name: Eggbot vs Zombies v2
game.description:
You have entered 4045 where only the egg bots can dare to fight against a horde of blood-thirsty zombies. Wait! Do not underestimate your power dude since you are leading the egg bots. Are you ready friends? Join Eggbot Vs Zombies and be prepared to save the eggbots against the multiple zombie waves! A single sec mistake will bring you to the hell from where no one will come back. Grab your gear and get ready to witness the biggest war of your life in this action-packed shooter challenge!

Do not bother since you are packed with more than 22 weapons to reply to these bad souls. All the people of your country have faith on your fighting abilities so fight like a champion to save the world from the undead. Your fellow eggbot robots are waiting for you on the way. Use this advanced machine that is already lashed with strong and advanced weapons to clear the hordes of deadly zombies shortly in this HTML5 nonstop shooting game!

Killing of every zombie rewards you with some cash so try to kill as many as you can to collect the maximum possible money! You can upgrade the suit of your character and weapons with the help of this cash. There are many new areas to explore in this endless zombie survival game. Complete all the missions and prove yourself as the true savior of the earth! This cool shooter includes multiple weapons to buy and use, 2D graphics with a side-scrolling view and various new locations to discover.
